label: 知行国主
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: ちぎょう こくしゅ
見出し読み_mod: ちぎょう こくしゅ
説明文: The lord of the province gained income from the provinces but did not directly administer it. Rights to the income of these provinces could be hereditarily transmitted, but they hinged upon the possession of court office and the favor of the sovereign.
